author: Reuters Editorial
title: Factbox: UK's Johnson in intensive care: Health experts comment
description: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson was moved to an intensive care unit at a London hospital on Monday after his symptoms of COVID-19 infection worsened.
content:
LONDON (Reuters) - British Prime Minister Boris Johnson was moved to an intensive care unit at a London hospital on Monday after his symptoms of COVID-19 infection worsened. 
Below are some immediate comments from health experts:
